author: Michael Cripe
description: Terminator: Survivors will no longer include multiplayer co-op, with developer Nacon announcing an indefinite delay that will now see its video game spinoff ditching early access for an eventual full launch.
title: Terminator: Survivors Suffers Indefinite Delay as Nacon Scraps Multiplayer Co-Op

author: Christian Wait
description: Save big with today’s best deals on Sony WH-1000XM6 headphones, LG Evo C5 4K OLED TVs, and Meta Quest 3 / 3S VR headsets. Limited-time discounts and Black Friday-level pricing.

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Sucker Punch co-founder Brian Fleming is stepping down n the new year after three decades at the studio behind Ghost of Tsushima, Sly Cooper, and Infamous.
title: Ghost of Tsushima Studio Sucker Punch's Co-Founder Brian Fleming Steps Down

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Bethesda developers including chief Todd Howard have issued an update on The Elder Scrolls 6 — but stopped short of confirming a release date.
title: The Elder Scrolls 6 Dev Says 'We're Going to Take Our Time and as Long as It Needs to Be Great,' Points to GTA 6 Delay as 'The Smartest Thing They Could Do'

author: Lex Briscuso
description: 1960 western classic The Magnificent Seven is getting a reboot from the creator of Heroes.
title: 1960 Western Classic The Magnificent Seven Is Getting a Reboot Series From the Creator of Heroes

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: This morning, the news broke that Larian Studios, developer of Baldur's Gate 3 and the upcoming, just-announced Divinity, is apparently using generative AI behind the scenes. The backlash has been swift, and now Larian founder and game director Swen Vincke is responding to clarify his remarks.
title: Larian CEO Responds to Divinity Gen AI Backlash: 'We Are Neither Releasing a Game With Any AI Components, Nor Are We Looking at Trimming Down Teams to Replace Them With AI'

author: Rachel Weber
title: How To Watch the Stray Kids SKZOO Concert in Roblox

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Bethesda has released a December update for Fallout 4 just in time for the holidays and the start of Fallout Season 2 on Prime Video. Check out the patch notes.
title: Fallout 4 December 2025 Patch Makes a Number of Fixes, Sorts 'A Few Key Pain Points for Players'

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: The weapons are characters all on their own in High on Life 2, the upcoming first-person shooter comedy sequel from Squanch Games. Say hi to the latest one to be revealed: the Flint Turtle, a flamethrowing reptile who can be wielded or thrown in order to singe your enemies.
title: High on Life 2 Weapon Reveal: Meet the Flint Turtle – IGN First

author: Scott Collura
description: The return of the Rage Virus, a look at the sins of the past, and Aunt Gladys all vie for the scariest movie of the year. This is the best horror movie of 2025!

description: From Mario Kart's roadtrip across an open world, to Donkey Kong's groundbreaking new adventure, these are the best Nintendo Switch games of 2025.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Capcom's Resident Evil Requiem trailer that revealed Leon S. Kennedy also featured yet another familiar face from the series' past, fans believe.
title: It Sure Sounds Like Resident Evil Requiem Features Another Familiar Character From Resident Evil 2, as Well as Leon

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: The LEGO Icons The Lord of The Rings: Rivendell set has received a $30 discount at Woot, dropping its price from $499.99 to $469.99 for a limited time.
title: Lord of the Rings Fans Can Score the Rivendell LEGO Set at Its Lowest Price Yet

author: Lex Briscuso
description: 2000’s How the Grinch Stole Christmas celebrates its 25th anniversary this year — and with that, the cast has been reminiscing about shooting the project, particularly highlighting an on-set incident where star Jim Carrey shut down a scene in which his young costar Taylor Momsen was moments away from being hurt.
title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas Star Taylor Momsen Recalls Jim Carrey 'Freaking Out' Over a Stunt That Could've Hurt Her

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Steven Spielberg’s next sci-fi thriller, Disclosure Day, has a debut trailer and a release date: June 12, 2026.
title: First Trailer for Steven Spielberg's Sci-Fi Thriller Disclosure Day Shows Emily Blunt Having Real Trouble With the Weather Report

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Home Alone director Chris Columbus is part of a truly solid crop of American directors who excelled in the comedy space in the 80s and 90s — but he isn’t quite as fond of the comedic efforts that came after his work in the Home Alone franchise. In fact, he recently went as far as to call the other installments “really bad.”
title: Home Alone Director Chris Columbus Is Not a Fan of the 'Really Bad' Sequels: 'They've Completely F***ed It Up'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo recorded more than 30 minutes of extra conversations featuring Metroid Prime 4: Beyond's chatty companion characters that don't currently appear in the game.
title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond Cut Content Shows Its Chatty Companions Were Originally Even More Chattier

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Larian has confirmed that its upcoming role-playing game, Divinity, is indeed turn-based following speculation from the developer's fans.
title: Divinity, Like Baldur’s Gate 3, Is a Turn-Based RPG, Larian Confirms

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Ahead of the hotly-anticipated launch of Fallout Season 2 on Prime Video, a Samsung executive has discussed the optimal TV picture settings for watching the show — and even got Bethesda development chief Todd Howard asking questions of his own.
title: Ahead of Fallout Season 2, Samsung Exec Understands Where Stranger Things Creator's Hate for 'Garbage' TV Settings Comes From — Meanwhile Todd Howard Wants to Know 'Backlight 20 or 11?'

description: Avatar: Fire and Ash review: This Na'vi adventure feels slightly less alien, but builds to an immensely gratifying finale that’s well worth the wait.

description: An authentic approach to New Vegas’ unique factions and a deepening of its complex original characters ensures the first six episodes of Fallout’s second season are a great return to the weird wasteland.

description: Resident Evil fans are worriedly discussing new screenshots of fan-favorite character Leon S. Kennedy in Requiem, which look to feature an ominous-looking mark on his neck.

description: Valve has outlined what's new in Dota 2 patch 7.40 and provided a rundown of its latest hero, Largo.

description: Point Break is reportedly getting a TV show set 35 years after the events of the iconic '90s surfing movie.

description: Copyright takedowns are targeting what appears to be a leaked version of Marvel's first Avengers: Doomsday trailer, which is now being snapped out of existence across social media.

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Resident Evil Requiem from The Game Awards finally confirmed that Leon S. Kennedy will return as the game’s second playable protagonist. Although he has aged a bit since we last saw him, Japanese fans have been taking to social media to praise Leon’s suave, older look.
title: Leon Kennedy's New Look for Resident Evil Requiem Makes Him a 'Hot Uncle' Heartthrob Among Japanese Fans

author: Vikki Blake
description: Monster Hunter Wilds Title Update 4 is finally here, and it makes a long list of gameplay and balance changes, as well as CPU/GPU improvements, load reduction, and the optimization of "PC-specific processes and addition of options and presets to reduce processing load." Check out the patch notes in full.
title: Monster Hunter Wilds' Huge Title Update 4 Out Now — Check Out the 1.040 Patch Notes
